nodes.text: The Avenel Rest Station was a space station located within an Inner Rim star system. The station was equipped with a medical wing.

By the date 41:3:1:10, a former bounty hunter was a patient in the medical wing of the station. He was connected to life support computers due to having had a severe case of muscle atrophy after prolonged use of myostim muscle-massaging units. The hunter's former partner, Gyaxx, later mentioned the Avenel Rest Station in the illegal database Gundark's Gear Datalog.
The Avenel Rest Station was first mentioned in the 1997 sourcebook Gundark's Fantastic Technology: Personal Gear, which was published for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
